channel.title: Abouts on Sai Bharadwaj Reddy
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Sai Bharadwaj Reddy

item.title: About
item.description: Hello. I’m currently pursuing my Master’s in computer science, with a concentration In AI and Robotics, from the University of North Carolina at Charlotte. My interest lies in Artificial General Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Data Science, and I have research-based experience in Interactive Deep-Reinforcement Learning, Legged robotics perception and navigation, and Brain-computer interfaces. Having worked on academic research projects in Machine Learning, Probabilistic modeling, Natural Language Processing, and Data Analysis for the past 2 years, I understand the challenges and creativity required to implement models.
